poemContent: The harmony of nature is equivocated, asthe racist is reintroduced into the habitat.The second coming of Christ, a noble man,yet his profile picture's a lie; Jetstream Sam.So don't expect any apologiesIf you're German, and conjure a rant,Rant turned to endless gifs and memesbut your suffering has only just began.N-words, b-words, f-words, et-cetera,fired at the American weeb's impenetrable defenses,immune by their lack of basic cognition,Yet for Jetstream Sam, only more ammunition,Little remains of the channel, here and now,lest the few who still remain,small talk echoes thought the server,fearing the attacks of Jetstream Sam again.
